column5: So im busy yesterday filleting up some fish and all the sudden it dawned on me it was supposed to be sunny. I took alook around and noticed somethimg familar, that yellowish haze produced by forest fires.  Checked it out online quick to find it it was a few hours away, phew.  Task two, find a good spot for a pic of the sun because it always looks awesome in that haze.  Got two shots decent enough to post but youll get the idea.  Looks pretty cool! These pics are not in any filter, just raw.
Cool picture for sure Rick and hopefully the wind is in the right direction to keep those fires away from you.
About 3 hours away as of yesterday.  Speaking of which I guess I better check, thanks Lew  Fire is just north of kenora and under control
cool shot. hope you guys get some good rains soon. early in the season for big fires like that.
